products.title: Banbury Stone Grey Curtain
products.description: The banbury stone curtain features a striking pattern of overlapping lines that gives appealing depth to the design. The print is in a cool grey hue that teamed with the pattern creates a clean and contemporary look that will update your interior. This quality curtain is lined for a full and attractive drape. Product id: db-cur1173 fabric colour: stone grey material: 78% polyester 14% cotton 8% linen lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes banbury stone grey curtain in grey.

products.title: Banbury Parchment Mink Curtain
products.description: The banbury parchment mink curtain will beautifully accent an earthy and contemporary interior. It features a striking geometric pattern in a warm grey-brown hue with a textured appearance. This quality fabric curtain is fully lined and is perfect for adding layered interest to your space with soft and sumptuous textiles. products.title: Banbury Petal Pink Curtain
products.description: The banbury petal pink curtain features a soft printed pattern in a dusky pink tone. The pattern is simple yet effective as the overlapping lines give detail and depth to the overall effect. This fully lined curtain is great for styling your space and bringing welcome shade and privacy. products.title: Banbury Canvas Curtain
products.description: Subtle and stylish, this curtain is ideal for enhancing a neutral scheme. The banbury canvas curtain features a clean geometric pattern of overlapping lines creating a dimensional woven effect. This design will suit a contemporary scheme or a more classic setting and features a full lining that is sure to give an elegant, quality look to the fabric.
